verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
With me, bear the hardships for the sake of the Good News,
relying on the power of God
who has saved us and called us to be holy â€“
not because of anything we ourselves
have done but for his own purpose and by his own grace.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
This grace had already been granted to us,
in Christ Jesus, before the beginning of time,
but it has only been revealed
by the Appearing of our saviour Christ Jesus.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He abolished death, and he has proclaimed life
and immortality through the Good News.
